original_title: The Incredible Adventure of Jojo (And His Annoying Little Sister Avila)
overview: A six year old boy named Jojo wakes up from a car crash deep within the woods. He reluctantly pulls his baby sister from the wreckage, plops her into his back pack, and together they try to make it home alive
tagline: How's a boy suppose to be a man with his sister always on his back?
title: The Incredible Adventure of Jojo (And His Annoying Little Sister Avila)
